sentence.Network_en: Scientists want to investigate the relation between xerophthalmia occurrence and smut contiguity.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学家们打算探讨干眼症与煤尘接触之间的关系.

sentence.Network_en: Our apartment building's contiguity to a supermarket is very convenient.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的公寓和超级市场相邻,购物相当方便.

sentence.Network_en: Taking into consideration of their contiguity to China.
sentence.Network_cn: 考虑到他们与中国相邻.

相连档案 contiguous file相连项 contiguous items连续字辨识 contiguous-words recognition
...的条件下，外国船舶可以在不事先通知或征得沿海国同意的情况下，连续不间断并迅速的通过其领海的航行权利。30.毗连区（contiguous zone）：领海以外邻接领海，沿海国在其中对特定事项行使必要管制的一带海域。31.专属经济区（the exclusive economic zone）：领海以外并邻接领海、自领.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from late Latin contiguitas, from Latin contiguus 'touching' (see contiguous)

means.word_mean: 1. the attribute of being so near as to be touching
